name: Tank Assault 2.0
description:
Greeting Tankers!

You Have 60 seconds to destroy your opponent! There are mines too.

Update 2.0 or what ever number: I have increased the mine spawns to 6.0s and have changed Player 2 Primary weapon button from Backslash to "L". I have also made other minor adjustments.

Controls:

Player 1 (M1A2 Abrams)

Movement

W: Move Forward

S: Backwards

A: Yaw Counter Clockwise

D: Yaw Clockwise

Weapon Systems

Spacebar: Fire Primary Cannon

C: Fire Coaxial Machine Gun

Player 2 (T-72)

Movement

Up Arrow: Forward

Down Arrow: Backwards

Left Arrow: Yaw Counter Clockwise 

Right Arrow: Yaw Clockwise

Weapon Systems

L: Fire Primary Weapon

'': Fire Coaxial Machine Gun

*All Sound effects are from ZapSplat.com
